alert.note: Alert for Russell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 15 at 1:51PM CST until December 15 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM CST FOR RICE...LINCOLN...ELLSWORTH...RUSSELL AND BARTON COUNTIES... At 150 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles south of Hunter to near Ellinwood, moving east at 45 mph. THESE ARE DESTRUCTIVE STORMS! HAZARD...80 to 90 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...You are in a life-threatening situation. Flying debris may be deadly to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be heavily damaged or destroyed. Homes and businesses will have substantial roof and window damage. Expect extensive tree damage and power outages. Locations impacted include... Great Bend, Russell, Lyons, Ellsworth, Hoisington, Sterling, Ellinwood, Wilson, Claflin, Kanopolis, Lincoln, Little River, Chase, Holyrood, Lucas, Gorham, Bushton, Sylvan Grove, Geneseo and Pawnee Rock. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...90 MPH
